de.wota.gameobjects

Class Ant

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.wota.gameobjects.Snapshot
      • de.wota.gameobjects.Ant

  • public class Ant
extends Snapshot
    Describes an ant. After creation it is read-only This is what an AI gets when it sees any ants. Created once per round for all the ants.
    Author:
    pascal
